battlecode.common
Class TerrainTile

java.lang.Object
  battlecode.common.TerrainTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TerrainTile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents of the terrain of a location on the map. This consists of
1. The type of the terrain (LAND, WATER or OFF_MAP)
2. The height of the terrain (an int)

See Also:

isTraversableAtHeight

public boolean isTraversableAtHeight(RobotLevel height)
Determines whether this type of terrain is traversable by objects that move at the specified.

Parameters:
height - the height to use to determine traversability
Returns:
true if objects at the given height can traverse this terrain type, false if they can't
